other_tests.findings: Moderate bilateral pleural effusions have increased compared with the prior study with associated dependent atelectasis. Moderate cardiomegaly is unchanged. The pancreas is mildly atrophied with a cystic lesion in the pancreatic head that is unchanged from the recent prior study. Multiple left-sided renal hypodensities are similar to the recent prior study including a septated left lower pole renal cystic lesion. The previously seen abscess cavity is collapsed around the catheter without evidence of new drainable fluid collection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased bilateral pleural effusions compared with the prior study. The pancreatic cystic lesion and renal hypodensities unchanged from prior studies.
